thread.title: The Tribeca Film Festival puts a spotlight on female filmmakers

title: The Tribeca Film Festival puts a spotlight on female filmmakers
text:
The Tribeca Film Festival puts a spotlight on female filmmakers   01:47 
The New York festival has its highest number of female feature film directors on its slate for the 17th year. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
